nodes.text: The Vectinia system was located in the Hewett sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Mid Rim. It was linked via hyperlanes to the Hewett system as well as the Tartaglia system in the Hollan sector.
The Vectinia system was home to the species known as Vectinian spiders. By 12 ABY, it fell within the borders of the New Republic.
The Vectinia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square M-7.
